doc:
David Munro (documentary filmmaker) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Munro_(documentary_filmmaker) 0 Ivor David Munro (1 July 1944 – 5 August 1999) was an English documentary filmmaker. He collaborated on 20 documentary films for television with the Australian-born journalist, John Pilger, with many of their works receiving awards. Their 1979 documentary about the suffering people of Cambodia resulted in viewers donating more than ₤45 million in aid. Ivor_David_Munro ( 1_July_1944 – 5_August_1999 ) was an_English_documentary_filmmaker . He collaborated on 20_documentary_films for television with the_Australian-born_journalist , John_Pilger , with many of their_works receiving awards . Their_1979_documentary about the_suffering_people of Cambodia resulted in viewers donating more_than_₤_45_million in aid .
